structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Utilization Of Qualified Independent Testing Laboratory For Testing Of Slot Machines And Other Gaming Equipment
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2011, 194, Sec. 16 effective November 22, 2011.] Unless the commission otherwise determines it to be in the best fiscal interests of the commonwealth, the commission shall utilize the services of an independent testing laboratory that has been qualified and approved by the commission pursuant to this chapter to perform the testing of slot machines and other gaming equipment and may also utilize applicable data from the independent testing laboratory, or from a governmental agency of a state other than the commonwealth, authorized to regulate slot machines and other gaming equipment.
